frameset.note: Frames file for 'try' based on survey of initial sentences from big corpus

roleset.name: Attempt

example.name: predicative arg1
example.text: Newsweek is trying to keep pace with rival Time magazine.
example.arg: to keep pace with rival Time magazine

roleset.note:
Watch out for fragments!
He spends his days sketching passers-by, or *trace=he* trying to *trace* Arg0 rel Arg1-PRD (second trace should be linked to "sketching passers-by")

example.name: ergative
example.text: The case wasn't tried in court. Arg1 ArgM-NEG rel ArgM-LOC
